Section.Catchline: Restrictions on insurance purchased by purchasing groups.

Subsection.Text: In order to purchase insurance or coverage for a risk located in this state, which risk is a subject of insurance of a member of the purchasing group, a purchasing group shall only purchase insurance or coverage from:

Paragraph.Text: A risk retention group that is certificated or licensed in one of the states of the United States;

Subsection.Text: A purchasing group shall utilize an agent licensed and appointed in this state in order to solicit, transact, or purchase insurance or coverage for a risk located in this state, which risk is a subject of insurance of a member of the purchasing group.
